title: URGENT RIOT!! I NEED MY ACCOUNT BACK SERVER TRANFER
body:
**Hi friends, I have a serious problem since I was in NA and I switched to LAN, but I did not change the name so I have an error because in LAN already there a summoner name created with my name. I can not connect or Na or LAN would like to know I can do want to change my name and my own back but I can not access my account. I would like to cancel the server transfer for vovler to do everything again. Thank you. I speak English and Spanish. Urgency, please, I'm desperate.

The problem is with other account. I can't log in my main account. Please I need a rioter, they have not responded to my requests

here is a pic**

http://imgur.com/nnWf2gn

**Thanks please help me******

replies.body: Someone can help me please I'm going crazy. I need help pleasee any player support
**Some rioter that I can contact with me do not respond to me for yesterday's requests. Please, I need help, I want my account. My account is locked**

Rest easy, we can help! Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as possible, and our account recovery team can help with your specific issue.  They can help with recovery as well as looking into transferring back.  Hang tight, and you'll get a response as soon as it's possible!
Hi procles, I filled it twice, the problem was yesterday and I have not had any response. That's why I want to contact me directly with someone here to help me. I'm going crazy :(
